Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 139th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1969...
Drafted in 7th round, 139th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1969...
Released by New York (N) on 4/1/1969...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/1/1971 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/7/1972 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1976...
Injured on 8/10/1976 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/13/1977 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/31/1977 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/4/1978 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/11/1978 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 9/7/1979 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1982...
Injured on 5/11/1982 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1986, going 4-2, 1.76...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Chicago (N) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF K. Gibson, P D. Stewart. Going to CHW: LF M. Greenwell, RF J. Buhner, CF L. Dykstra, P G. Swindell, 1B F. Stubbs)...
